name: Holiday Crab Puffs
author: cookie14
summary: Tasty crab puffs... made these for the holidays and everyone loved them!
ingredients: 2 (17.5 ounce) packages frozen puff pastry, thawed
½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
¼ teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Use a 2-inch cookie cutter to cut puff pastry into forty rounds
Transfer to the prepared baking sheets
Mix mayonnaise, cream cheese, lemon juice, seafood seasoning, and salt together in a medium bowl
Spoon about 2 teaspoons onto each pastry round
Bake in the preheated oven until pastries are golden and crisp, rotating halfway through, 20 to 25 minutes
Sprinkle with additional seafood seasoning, if desired, and serve hot
